title: Viva Film
description: Viva Film is a web project that showcases a film community platform, highlighting film examples, cameras, and lenses.

title: Next Retro Game
description: Compilation of stunning 3D retro-themed images crafted using Blender and Aframe, seamlessly integrated into the Next.js web development framework.

title: Next Play
description: Next Play is a minimalism aesthetically pleasing and responsive web music application built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Spotify, and the Unsplash API.
